attributes.action: FEED OUR SOLDIERS NOW and also allow BFPO parcels to be sent FREE OF CHARGE to our BRAVE SOLDIERS being asked to make the ultimate sacrifice on  behalf of the security of our Nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present food parcels to our forces serving abroad are being charged £5.00 for 2kg.  Shortages of food, supplies and equipment has been well documented by serving personnel and their Generals since the beginning of the Iraq War and it continues today.  The Government must be asked to increase funding for our Armed Forces Now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
